data.title: Coffee Break: Fame
data.meta_description: Today in 1975, David Bowie's "Fame" was released. So for today's 9:30 Coffee Break, what songs do you want to hear that mention some form of being famous?
data.text:
Today in 1975, David Bowie's "Fame" was released.

"Fame" became Bowie's biggest hit to that point in the U.S. and it was his first No. 1 hit on the Billboard Hot 100 chart.

So for today's 9:30 Coffee Break, what songs do you want to hear that mention some form of being famous?

Respond with your song ideas in the comments below.

Have an idea for a Coffee Break topic? Submit your idea for a future theme and browse past Coffee Breaks in our archive. Or, when you register for a Minnesota Public Radio account, you can send requests via Alexa, too Just say "Alexa, ask The Current to play Song by Artist" e.g. "Alexa, ask The Current to play Left of the Dial by The Replacements."

Songs played
